DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The aim research compare effectiveness myofascial release therapy exercise therapy pain , quality sleep , anxiety , trigger point , joint sound individual temporomandibular disorder myofascial pain-dysfunction syndrome . Material Methods : A single-blind randomized clinical trial conduct university research clinic . Sixty-four subject temporomandibular disorder myofascial pain-dysfunction syndrome randomly assign physical therapy group ( myofascial release protocol Rocabado exercise therapy ) control group ( exercise therapy ) . Intensity pain , quality life , quality sleep , anxiety , trigger point , joint sound collected baseline , forty-eight hour intervention phase .
DOC.brief_title: Miofascial Release Exercises Therapy Treatment Temporomandibular Disorders
DOC.criteria: Presence myofascial pain without jaw open limitation ( Ia Ib ) accord Research Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC / TMD ) . A chief complaint acute pain ( duration < 6 month ) temporomandibular joint least one side . The presence joint click jaw opening eliminate protrusive opening . Agreement attend even therapy session . Subjects dental pain tender muscle cause systemic disease . Major psychological disorder . A recent history trauma face neck area . Subjects wear full partial denture . Edentulism . Therapeutic cointerventions treatment . Indication surgical treatment temporomandibular joint .
